column5: Have not posted here much lately but this one deserves to be posted. On June the 10th, we welcomed my other child to the world 3 weeks early and just in tme for Fathers day.  Hope all you fathers out there are having a great day cause this is what makes it all worth while. Our Sons name is Noah. I now have 2 fishing partners to train to beat me, lol.  Noah and Rylea
